const boxVariants={initial:{opacity:0,scale:0},visible:{opacity:1,scale:1},leaving:{opacity:0,scale:0}};export default function LoginBox(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({id:'',password:''});const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const[userName,setUserName]=useState('');const[isLocationSaved,setIsLocationSaved]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// 페이지 로드 시 저장된 로그인 정보 확인
